plot: Inside Revolution proposes a journey at the heart of a process of creation. Montreal artist, filmmaker and painter, Yoakim Belanger, reveals the wings of his artistic universe in this movie...
title: Inside Revolution
plot_es: Inside Revolution proposes a journey at the heart of a process of creation. Montreal artist, filmmaker and painter, Yoakim Belanger, reveals the wings of his artistic universe in this movie...
